# attachmentFileURLs

**Instance Property**

An array of NSURL objects representing the files that were shared.

## Declaration

```swift
var attachmentFileURLs: [URL]? { get }
```

## Getting the Shared Items

- **messageBody**: The message body as a string.
- **permanentLink**: A permanent URL (permalink) that your app can use to access the post.
